roleset.name: set into place
roleset.note: DEPLOY-V NOTES: Secondary predication doesn't seem to appear with deploy, only withredeploy. Makes me wonder about its validity. (from deploy.01-v)
DEPLOYMENT-N NOTES: Based on frame for deploy-v.xml. Framed by Anwen March 2011. No VNcls. (from deployment.01-n)

example.name: passivized
example.text: But more recently, the pound has been falling with high inflation, which has also seemed almost impervious to the high interest rates *trace* Mr. Lawson deployed *trace* to stop it.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The airbag deployment broke Brian's nose.

example.name: all args
example.text: The Army's deployment of troops to Morocco seemed to temporarily quell the violence.
